title: A Historical Figure in a Modern Context
description: Listen to Drew Lanham describe Audubon and his “readymade appearance,” during the artist’s lifetime and ever since. Lanham discusses what inspired him to write “tweets” in the gallery.

title: !Contexto moderno para una figura histórica
description: !Escuche a Drew Lanham describir a Audubon y su "apariencia prefabricada", durante la vida del artista y desde entonces. Lanham habla sobre lo que lo inspiró a escribir "tweets" en la galería.

read_view.title: Annotating Art
read_view.description: Explore five different pages that are written, drawn on, and highlighted by Drew. Lanham has reinterpreted a copy of The Birds of America by writing personal notes on several pages. He calls it “My Feel Guide through The Birds of America.” He uses his artist form to ask questions, write poems, and explore difficult histories directly in relation to The Birds of America.
read_view.info_controls_text:
Use your finger to swipe the pages left and right. You can swipe the corners down or use the    left or right    arrows to turn the page.
Double tap on the page or use the zoom_in and zoom_out to zoom in and out and explore Drew’s pages more closely.
